meanings.definition: A hormone that stimulates the growth or function of tissues or organs.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained how tropins help our bodies grow.
meanings.sent2: Tropins are important for the development of muscles and bones.
meanings.sent3: The tropins in my body must be working overtime with how fast I'm growing!
meanings.sent4: Her encouragement acted like tropins, fueling his determination to succeed.
meanings.sent5: The tropins in the plant caused it to flourish and bloom beautifully.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of hormones that regulate the growth and function of the gonads.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the effects of tropins on reproductive organs.
meanings.sent2: Tropins play a crucial role in maintaining the health of the gonads.
meanings.sent3: I joked that the tropins must be having a party in my reproductive system.
meanings.sent4: The tropins acted like traffic controllers, directing the growth of the gonads.
meanings.sent5: Without tropins, the gonads wouldn't be able to function properly.
